PSYC 101.name: PSYC 101
PSYC 101.title: Introduction to Biological and Cognitive Psychology

PSYC 102.name: PSYC 102
PSYC 102.title: Introduction to Developmental, Social, Personality, and Clinical Psychology

PSYC 207.name: PSYC 207
PSYC 207.title: Contemporary Topics in Biological and Cognitive Psychology

PSYC 208.name: PSYC 208
PSYC 208.title: Contemporary Topics in Social, Developmental, Personality, and Clinical Psychology

PSYC 216.name: PSYC 216
PSYC 216.title: Questioning Psychological Science in the Media

PSYC 218.name: PSYC 218
PSYC 218.prereqText: One of PSYC 217, PSYC 277. And a major in Psychology, Cognitive Systems, or Speech Sciences.
PSYC 218.title: Analysis of Behavioural Data

PSYC 260.name: PSYC 260
PSYC 260.prereqText: Completion of first-year Science program and permission of the department head is also required.
PSYC 260.title: Experimental Psychology and Laboratory

PSYC 270.name: PSYC 270
PSYC 270.prereqText: Either (a) SCIE 001 and BIOL 140;  or (b) one of CHEM 111, CHEM 121, CHEM 123 and all of BIOL 121, BIOL 140. And second-year standing in a Behavioural Neuroscience specialization.
PSYC 270.title: Introduction to Behavioural Neuroscience

PSYC 277.name: PSYC 277
PSYC 277.prereqText: Either (a) SCIE 001 and BIOL 140;  or (b) one of CHEM 111, CHEM 121, CHEM 123 and all of BIOL 121, BIOL 140. And second-year standing in a Behavioural Neuroscience specialization.
PSYC 277.title: Behavioural and Neuroscientific Research Methods

PSYC 278.name: PSYC 278
PSYC 278.title: Analysis of Behavioural and Neuroscientific Data

PSYC 336.prereqText: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) two of PSYC 101, PSYC 102, PSYC 205, PSYC 207, PSYC 208, PSYC 216, PSYC 217, PSYC 277. Strongly recommended: PSYC 101 and either PSYC 216 or one of PSYC 217 or 277. Non-PSYC students may substitute ENGL 329, or LING 420, or LING 200 and 201 for the above prerequisite.

PSYC 349.name: PSYC 349
PSYC 349.prereqText: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) all of PSYC 101, PSYC 102;  and all of PSYC 217,  218. Restricted to students in Honours.

PSYC 359.name: PSYC 359
PSYC 359.prereqText: Either (a) one of PSYC 217, PSYC 277 and one of PSYC 218, PSYC 278;  or (b) PSYC 366.
PSYC 359.title: Advanced Research Methods in Behavioural Sciences

PSYC 361.name: PSYC 361
PSYC 361.prereqText: One of PSYC 260, PSYC 270, PSYC 304, PSYC 360, PSYC 370.
PSYC 361.title: Neuroscience of Motivation

PSYC 363.name: PSYC 363
PSYC 363.prereqText: One of BIOL 260, BIOL 361, BIOL 455, BIOL 458, CAPS 301, PSYC 260, PSYC 263, PSYC 270, PSYC 304.
PSYC 363.title: Neuroscience of Simple Learning

PSYC 367.name: PSYC 367
PSYC 367.prereqText: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) all of PSYC 101, PSYC 102 or (c) 6 credits of 200-level Psychology (but not 205 or 263).
PSYC 367.title: Sensory Systems

PSYC 370.name: PSYC 370
PSYC 370.prereqText: One of PSYC 260, PSYC 270 and one of PSYC 217, PSYC 277 and one of PSYC 218, PSYC 278.
PSYC 370.title: Behavioural Neuroscience I

PSYC 404.name: PSYC 404
PSYC 404.prereqText: One of PSYC 217, PSYC 277, PSYC 366 and one of PSYC 305, PSYC 307, PSYC 308, PSYC 358.
PSYC 404.title: Psychology of Religion

PSYC 409.name: PSYC 409
PSYC 409.prereqText: Either (a) one of PSYC 217, PSYC 277 and one of PSYC 218, PSYC 277;  or (b) PSYC 366 and one of PSYC 309, PSYC 365.

PSYC 413.name: PSYC 413
PSYC 413.prereqText: One of PSYC 302, PSYC 315, PSYC 319, PSYC 322, PSYC 325.

PSYC 421.prereqText: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) two of PSYC 101, PSYC 102, PSYC 205, PSYC 207, PSYC 208, PSYC 216, PSYC 217, PSYC 277. Strongly recommended: PSYC 101 and either PSYC 216 or one of PSYC 217 or 277.

PSYC 427.name: PSYC 427
PSYC 427.prereqText: Either (a) one of PSYC 217, PSYC 277 and one of PSYC 218, PSYC 278;  or (b) PSYC 366. Restricted to Majors and Honours in Psychology. Consult Section Notes or the Psychology Department website for 300-level course(s) recommended for a specific offering.
PSYC 427.title: Advanced Seminar in Psychology

PSYC 449.name: PSYC 449
PSYC 449.prereqText: PSYC 349. Fourth-year standing. Restricted to students in Honours. Intended for students in their graduating year.
PSYC 449.title: Honours Seminar and Essay

PSYC 461.name: PSYC 461
PSYC 461.prereqText: One of PSYC 304, PSYC 360, PSYC 371, PSYC 460.
PSYC 461.title: Neuroplasticity and Behaviour

PSYC 462.name: PSYC 462
PSYC 462.prereqText: One of PSYC 304, PSYC 360, PSYC 371. BIOL 205 and/or PCTH 325 recommended.
PSYC 462.title: Drugs and Behavioural Neuroscience
